snippet: Three stories of immigrants touch on the challenges they have faced and the ways in which they have persevered, part of the coverage of the 104th annual campaign of The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
abstract: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund begins its 104th annual campaign; three stories of immigrants, who make up about 37 percent of city's overall population of 8.2 million, helped by Neediest Cases Fund highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Three stories of immigrants touch on the challenges they have faced and the ways in which they have persevered, part of the coverage of the 104th annual campaign of The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.

headline.print_headline: A New Life, New Challenges and a Firm Resolve
headline.main: A New Life, New Challenges and a Firm Resolve

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
